item.title: DDev Plastiks Industries Ltd Forms Death Cross Signalling Potential Bearish Trend
item.description: DDev Plastiks Industries Ltd, a small-cap player in the Specialty Chemicals sector, has recently formed a Death Cross, a technical pattern where the 50-day moving average crosses below the 200-day moving average. This development signals a potential shift towards a bearish trend, raising concerns about the stock’s near-term momentum and long-term strength. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: Sensex and Nifty Rally as Oil & Gas Sector Leads; Small Caps Outperform
item.description: Indian equity markets closed higher on 31 Dec 2025, with the Nifty gaining 0.74% to settle at 26,129.60 and the Sensex advancing 0.64% to 85,220.60. Broad-based sectoral strength, led by the Oil & Gas segment, and robust market breadth underpinned the rally as investors positioned ahead of key corporate earnings and global cues. Time: 4 hours ago
